data.message: Mr Mathers, there was a time I wanted to die but ur music helped me forget about everything. U were n still r my superhero! Listening to u even improved my English language a lot n made me fit it. For some reason I was in love with everything about u which was really fun. Even up to this day I listen to ur old songs n learn signs u have left. I hope n pray the best for u! N wish u more n more success in everything u do! Take care.
